column1: Kata Robata////Definitely make a reservation. We made the mistake of not doing so
column2: but easily killed time at the bar as we waited. The ambiance is great for a date or a nice dinner
column3: and the food was some of the best I've ever had. The Texas Kobe Beef skewers were super flavorful and will melt right in your mouth. If you are a dumpling fanatic like me
column4: don't miss out on the wagyu and shrimp shumai!!! The portions are very small
column5: so I would Â recommend getting at-least two dishes per person if you can!
